pageTitle: Difference between revisions of "Projects/rekonq/Roadmap" - KDE TechBase
textBeforeTable: Planned for 1.0 If you wanna start contributing, feel free to add one task or simply add your name to one of the features here. You are absolutely free with the RED ones. Contact the developer in the "assignee" column if you wanna help in a YELLOW status feature. (IRC or the mailing list are your friends here) This document has the purpose of informing users as to in which direction rekonq is going. This is not a guarantee of what will be done! This is the Roadmap Revision as of 05:53, 22 August 2010 |web shortcuts from a contextual menu in search fields   |web shortcuts from a contextual menu in search fields   |-   |-   | + adjam, lionel | − DONE |style="background-color:yellow;" | + WIP |style="background-color:yellow;" | − | http://gitorious.org/rekonq/mainline/commits/HistoryReview2   | http://gitorious.org/rekonq/mainline/commits/HistoryReview2   |History management review   |History management review
textAfterTable: Planned for some future release Feature Comment Status Assignee New rekonq web site TODO Tabs up TODO adjam Extensions support See Extensions for ideas http://gitorious.org/~nikhilm/rekonq/nikhilms-mainline/commits/extensions WIP Multitasking WIP megabigbug, ivan "khrome" mode implement some simple changes (disable tab, add new window button somewhere and so on..) to integrate rekonq with kwin tabbing feature TODO ..an hero here..
